title: Starbucks to close 8,000 stores for anti-bias training
text:
Starbucks to close 8,000 stores for anti-bias training 8:51am EDT - 01:29
Starbucks is closing 8,000 company-owned U.S. stores at around 2 pm local time on Tuesday as a first step in training 175,000 employees on racial tolerance.
Starbucks is closing 8,000 company-owned U.S. stores at around 2 pm local time on Tuesday as a first step in training 175,000 employees on racial tolerance. //reut.rs/2ITrJl9
